full_article.title: Mountain biking
full_article.body: I was lucky to grow up in British Columbia - one of the best places for mountain biking. Now I am exploring what the Bay area has to offer when it comes to knarly decents.

full_article.title: Playing trombone
full_article.body: Both my parents are professional musicians. As a result, I was exposed to classical music at an early age. I played violin for 10 years before I picked up the trombone. For all 5 years of high school, I played in the jazz band. We went on multiple trips and competed in various competitons. I now casually play with a group of friends and am exploring different kinds of music!

full_article.title: Tesla - Mechanical Engineer
full_article.body:
Led development of a safety critical test rig to validate vehicle underside impact performance.
Reduced test times by 80%, increased accuracy, and freed up time of one technician and one engineer.

full_article.title: YDot - Founder and Software Engineer
full_article.body: YDot links all related data to a piece of hardware, starting with test engineering data. With YDot, engineers can leverage a single source of truth to make better and faster decisions.
